mapper.sql: cst_id, cst_code, cst_name, cst_password, cst_birthday, cst_sex, cst_email, cst_phone, cst_address, cst_idcard, create_time, cst_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_cst
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_cst
cst_id,
cst_code,
cst_name,
cst_password,
cst_birthday,
cst_sex,
cst_email,
cst_phone,
cst_address,
cst_idcard,
create_time,
cst_status,

mapper.update:
update sys_cst
cst_id = #{record.cstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_code = #{record.cstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_name = #{record.cstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_password = #{record.cstPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_birthday = #{record.cstBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
cst_sex = #{record.cstSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_email = #{record.cstEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_phone = #{record.cstPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_address = #{record.cstAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_idcard = #{record.cstIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cst_status = #{record.cstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_cst set cst_id = #{record.cstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_code = #{record.cstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_name = #{record.cstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_password = #{record.cstPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_birthday = #{record.cstBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, cst_sex = #{record.cstSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_email = #{record.cstEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_phone = #{record.cstPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_address = #{record.cstAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_idcard = #{record.cstIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_status = #{record.cstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_cst
cst_code = #{cstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_name = #{cstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_password = #{cstPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_birthday = #{cstBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
cst_sex = #{cstSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_email = #{cstEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_phone = #{cstPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_address = #{cstAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cst_idcard = #{cstIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cst_status = #{cstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cst_id = #{cstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_cst set cst_code = #{cstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_name = #{cstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_password = #{cstPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_birthday = #{cstBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, cst_sex = #{cstSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_email = #{cstEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_phone = #{cstPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_address = #{cstAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_idcard = #{cstIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_status = #{cstStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cst_id = #{cstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
